metadata.title: CVE-2024-51754 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Twig is a template language for PHP. In a sandbox, an attacker can call`__toString()` on an object even if the `__toString()` method is notallowed by the security policy when the object is part of an array or anargument list (arguments to a function or a filter for instance). Thisissue has been patched in versions 3.11.2 and 3.14.1. All users are advisedto upgrade. There are no known workarounds for this issue.

criterions.comment: php-twig package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
